info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 7:21PM EDT until July 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Oneida County in central New York... Southern Madison County in central New York... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Erieville, or 8 miles west of Hamilton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirkland, Westmoreland, Eaton, Paris, Hamilton, Morrisville, Stockbridge, Augusta, Clinton and Waterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
